inair.view

Class UILayeredViewItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • inair.data.DependencyObject
      • inair.data.IAElement
        • inair.view.UIView
          • inair.view.UILayeredViewItem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAInputElement, UIViewManager, UIViewParent

    public final class UILayeredViewItem
extends UIView
implements UIViewParent, UIViewManager

    Present a single layer of layered navigation view 

     Attribute for UILayeredViewItem can use in layout xml file

 attr name="title" format="string" getTitle() setTitle(CharSequence)

 And all attribute can use with UIView

    Note this class is currently under early design and development. The API will likely change in later updates of the compatibility library, requiring changes to the source code of apps when they are compiled against the newer version.

    Copyright (c) 2014 SeeSpace.co. All rights reserved.
